formalpara.title: Figure 2. The small GTPase cycle.
formalpara.para: GEFs promote GTP loading to activate small GTPases, while GAPs stimulate intrinsic GTP hydrolysis to inactivate small GTPases. Guanine nucleotide dissociation inhibitors (GDIs) sequester GDP-bound, prenylated GTPases, and can sequester or chaperone them among plasma membrane and subcellular compartments.
